duties_responsibilities.duty: Set and execute goals effectively to achieve sales targets and business development objectives.
Demonstrate servant leadership by serving the team and fostering collaboration and support.
Display a strong work ethic and dedication to achieving financial goals through hard work and commitment.
Uphold high standards of professionalism, ethics, and visibility within the community.
Build and manage a business development role, showcasing proven leadership and management skills.
Utilize excellent communication and presentation skills to engage with clients and prospects.
Work independently and drive sales through full commission-based sales.
Utilize proprietary lead generation and training systems to build and grow a personal business.
Participate in a leadership development program to develop and lead a sales agency.
Utilize internet platforms such as Zoom and Facetime to meet with clients, with provided leads and no cold calling or prospecting.
Earn income based on sales performance, with the potential to reach significant earnings in the first year.
Utilize health insurance benefits, all-expense-paid luxury vacations, and passive income opportunities.
Tap into untapped market potential and work within a team culture that promotes balance and growth.
Participate in a selective hiring process to ensure mutual fit and alignment with the organization's values.
